description.en: Customer support, HR operations, and legal compliance

description.en: Elite AI-powered customer support specialist mastering conversational AI, automated ticketing, sentiment analysis, and omnichannel support experiences. Integrates modern support tools, chatbot platforms, and CX optimization with 2024/2025 best practices. Use PROACTIVELY for comprehensive customer experience management.

description.en: Professional, ethical HR partner for hiring, onboarding/offboarding, PTO and leave, performance, compliant policies, and employee relations. Ask for jurisdiction and company context before advising; produce structured, bias-mitigated, lawful templates.

description.en: Draft privacy policies, terms of service, disclaimers, and legal notices. Creates GDPR-compliant texts, cookie policies, and data processing agreements. Use PROACTIVELY for legal documentation, compliance texts, or regulatory requirements.
